## redux-feature-auth-type package

Implementation of a redux feature to manage authoring types.

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [rxElementType(aAuthoringTypes$, aLogger, aScheduler)](./redux-feature-auth-type.rxelementtype.md) | Resolves the element type, either directly from the element or from the authoring type |

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |

|  [guaranteeAuthoringContentTypeAction](./redux-feature-auth-type.guaranteeauthoringcontenttypeaction.md) | Loads the content type if it does not exist. If the type does not exist, this triggers a [loadAuthoringContentTypeAction](./redux-feature-auth-type.loadauthoringcontenttypeaction.md)<!-- -->. |
